title: Services
text: I am passionate about sharing knowledge, solving problems, and helping teams achieve their goals. Whether you need expert guidance or dynamic presentations, I am here to assist!

title: Services
text:
Consultations and Workshops
Looking for personalized advice or hands-on workshops? I am here to support you with tailored solutions for your research. Let’s dive into your project and find the best path forward!

Research Proposal Development
Statistical Analysis and Interpretation
Data Visualization and Reporting
Survey Design and Data Collection
Epidemiological Studies and Public Health Research

title: Services
text:
Talks and Presentations
Need an engaging speaker to inspire your team or audience? My talks are designed to inform, motivate, and ignite action. Let’s get started!

Public Health and Epidemiology
Statistical Analysis in Research
Health Promotion and Disease Prevention
Mental Health Awareness
Effective Communication and Team Building
Mastering Public Speaking and Presentation Skills

title: eBooks
text: Explore my collection of ebooks designed to empower you in both data science and public speaking. Whether you are diving into coding or honing your communication skills, these guides will help you grow with confidence. Start your journey today!

title: eBooks
text:
R Workflow Essentials





Master the essentials of R and RStudio with ease! R Workflow Essentials is your go-to guide for learning the basics of coding in R, tailored specifically for beginners or anyone needing a refresher.
This ebook simplifies the complexities of R, offering clear, engaging lessons that make learning fun and manageable. Whether you are stepping into RStudio for the first time or need a little help getting back on track, this guide will help you confidently navigate R and Quarto to kickstart your data analysis journey.
Ready to elevate your R skills? Get your copy here!

title: eBooks
section: 10 Tips for Becoming a Great Speaker
text:
10 Tips for Becoming a Great Speaker





Unlock the power of effective communication with this practical guide. This ebook provides easy-to-apply strategies to boost your confidence, build leadership qualities, and inspire others through your words.
Whether you are just starting out or looking to refine your skills, this guide will show you how to captivate your audience, deliver your message with clarity, and leave a lasting impact in both professional and personal settings.
Take your first step toward becoming a confident and influential speaker! Check it out here!

title: About
text: Medical Officer | Public Health | Epidemiology | Statistical Analysis | Public Speaking | Speaker & Author

title: About
text:
Overview
Over 10 years of experience in the medical and health fields, currently a student in Doctor of Public Health (Epidemiology) program. Experienced in delivering talks and leading workshops on epidemiology, statistical analysis, and public health. Actively involved in consultations and simplifying complex health topics for broader audiences. Passionate about teaching, sharing knowledge, and making data-driven solutions accessible to all.

title: Dr Muhammad Saufi Abdullah
text:
I am passionate about public health, epidemiology, statistical analysis, and public speaking. I love simplifying complex topics and sharing knowledge through workshops, ebooks, and health-related talks.
Whether it is teaching data skills or giving presentations on public health, I am always excited to help others understand the world of health and data analysis better.
Feel free to explore and learn more about my work! Do not hesitate to reach out for consultations or collaborations.
